editorialSummary.text: Bookseller chain stocking housebrand eReader, plus a broad selection of titles for adults & kids.

originalText.text: I love this big box. It's like a library and gathering place where we can venture through time and titles, confined only by our imagination. It doesn't hush. It inspires and thrives by the written word; a feast of literary delicacies that feeds a hungry mind.

text.text: I love this big box. It's like a library and gathering place where we can venture through time and titles, confined only by our imagination. It doesn't hush. It inspires and thrives by the written word; a feast of literary delicacies that feeds a hungry mind.

originalText.text: Don't ever get the expedited shipping option. This item took about two weeks to be delivered with the "express" shipping. I contacted their "customer service" (they need to change the name of that role) and was told it is express shipping once it leaves the warehouse, which could be a while. Buyer beware with this company.

text.text: Don't ever get the expedited shipping option. This item took about two weeks to be delivered with the "express" shipping. I contacted their "customer service" (they need to change the name of that role) and was told it is express shipping once it leaves the warehouse, which could be a while. Buyer beware with this company.

originalText.text:
B&N is in a unique position in that they have only one real competitor. I am going to submit ideas and suggestions for management review and consideration.
The first objective is to distinguish themselves from a company whose only objective is to sell anything they can at a profit. As a company they have no real interest in authors or their books.
B&N has to demonstrate that they are company with a Culture that actually loves the product they make available, namely books, because of the benefits to their fellow human beings. They are on a mission.
They sincerely want to improve the lives of people by being informed, educated,influenced, and happier, by what they read.
The future of the world depends upon people reading books,
B&N intends to help in achieving that goal.Books mean a lot more than dollars to them.
